comment: Mr. Walker knows his Python. But he doesn't seem familiar with all assignment requirements and sometimes they stump him too! While generally good with responding to email, I wouldn't count on a last-minute question being answered; discussion boards aren't really addressed either. Good GTA overall (funny!), but he wouldn't be my first choice.

Lab grades are assessed during class, so if you dont go you wont get a grade. Luckily the actual lab check off is only like 10% of your grade, final 50% and the other 40% comes from HW(Assignments). Their is probably about ten actual mins of teaching and the remainder 1.5 hours is sat thinking into outer space trying to figure out how to code.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: For teaching python he's not the most experienced but surprisingly can teach something he has barely touched before 1000x times better than all the lab professors. Only thing that kinda frustrated me was that EVERY assignment after If-else statements were over stuff we have never learned from lecture and were expected to figure out on our own
